description: This header file declares the exported API functions for the CCSP CWMP TCP Connection Request Handler component, including creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization functions.

methods.name: CcspCwmpCreateTcpConnReqHandler
methods.description: Creates a TCP Connection Request Handler object, taking container, owner, and reserved contexts as parameters.

methods.name: CcspCwmpTcpcrhoCreate
methods.description: Creates a CCSP CWMP TCP Connection Request Handler object with specified contexts.

methods.name: CcspCwmpTcpcrhoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified TCP Connection Request Handler object.

methods.name: CcspCwmpTcpcrhoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the TCP CR handler.

methods.name: CcspCwmpTcpcrhoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the TCP CR handler object.
